GK19bhall_iu:300: labdhāyāṃ tṛṣi gomṛgasya vihagasyānyasay vā kasya cid Bhall_42a
GK19bhall_iu:301: lokaś cāyam aniṣṭadarśanakṛtād dṛgvaiśasān mocito Bhall_83c
GK19bhall_iu:302: lokaṃ hantum anāgasaṃ dvirasanā randhreṣu ye jāgrati Bhall_80b
GK19bhall_iu:303: lokād ṛte jagati te api vai gṛhītvā Bhall_75b
GK19bhall_iu:304: lobho vāyam utānavasthitir iyaṃ pradveṣa evāthavā Bhall_36b
GK19bhall_iu:310: vātā vāntu kadambareṇuśabalā nṛtyantu sarpadviṣaḥ Bhall_97a
GK19bhall_iu:314: vidyut kiṃ sphurasi tvam apy akaruṇe strītve 'pi tulye sati Bhall_97d
GK19bhall_iu:315: vipāke tūlo 'ntaḥ sapadi marutā so 'py apahṛtaḥ Bhall_101d
GK19bhall_iu:316: viśatu vahnim atha vrajatu kṣitim Bhall_9b
GK19bhall_iu:317: viśālaṃ śālmalyā nayanasubhagaṃ vīkṣya kusumaṃ Bhall_101a
GK19bhall_iu:318: viśikha nipatan krūraṃ dūrān nṛśaṃsa nihaṃsi yat Bhall_64d
GK19bhall_iu:320: vīkṣyante na ta eva khalv iha ruṣā vāryanta evāthavā Bhall_22b
GK19bhall_iu:321: vṛtta eva sa ghaṭo 'ndhakūpa yas Bhall_68a
GK19bhall_iu:323: vṛṣṭyā syād bhavadīyayopakṛtir ity āstāṃ davīyasy adaḥ Bhall_42b
GK19bhall_iu:324: vedhā kliṣṭo na yad vṛthā Bhall_30b
GK19bhall_iu:325: velām ity udaraṃpriyā madhulihaḥ soḍhuṃ kṣaṇaṃ na kṣamāḥ Bhall_92d
GK19bhall_iu:326: vyathāṃ candro neṣyaty anucitam ato nāsty asadṛśam Bhall_13b
GK19bhall_iu:327: vyadhāsyad durvedhā hṛdayalaghimānaṃ yadi na te Bhall_26c
GK19bhall_iu:328: vyādhasyāsya yathā bhaviṣyati tathā manye vanaṃ nrimṛgam Bhall_94d
GK19bhall_iu:330: vyālās te 'pi dadhaty amī sadasator mūḍhā maṇīn mūrdhabhir Bhall_80c
GK19bhall_iu:335: śamyo bhrāmyasi mūḍha nirmaruti kiṃ mithyaiva martuṃ marau Bhall_54d
GK19bhall_iu:336: śaraṇam athavānṛjvī dīrghā tavaiva śirodharā Bhall_23b
GK19bhall_iu:339: śikṣā sāpi jitārjunaprabhrtikā sarvatra nimnā gatiḥ Bhall_94b
GK19bhall_iu:340: śukasyāsīd buddhiḥ phalam api bhaved asya sadṛśam Bhall_101b
GK19bhall_iu:342: śrāvyo na yo yo na sadarthaśaṃsī Bhall_28d
GK19bhall_iu:347: sacchāyāḥ kadalīdrumāḥ surabhayaḥ kiṃ puṣpitāś campakāḥ Bhall_54b
GK19bhall_iu:351: sad apy asad iva sthitaṃ sphuritam anta ojasvinām Bhall_88d
GK19bhall_iu:355: santo 'py asanta iva cet pratibhānti bhānor Bhall_12c
GK19bhall_iu:356: sanmūlaḥ prathitonnatir ghanalasacchāyaḥ sthitaḥ satpathe Bhall_38a
GK19bhall_iu:357: samaṃ jātaṃ sarvair na samam athavānyair avayavaiḥ Bhall_65d
GK19bhall_iu:358: sampraty etad anargalaṃ balibhujā māyāvinā bhujyate Bhall_22d
GK19bhall_iu:359: sambandho 'nanurūpayāpi na kṛtaḥ kiṃ candanasya tvayā Bhall_36d
GK19bhall_iu:361: sarvasyaupayikāni yāni katicit kśetrāṇi tatrāśaniḥ Bhall_41c
GK19bhall_iu:362: sarvān aupāyikeṣu dagdhasikatāraṇyeṣv apāṃ vṛṣṭayaḥ Bhall_41d
GK19bhall_iu:363: sarvāsāṃ trijagaty apām iyam asāv ādhāratā tāvakī Bhall_46a
GK19bhall_iu:364: sahasram api ghasmaro 'vikṛtam eṣa teṣāṃ pibet Bhall_88b
GK19bhall_iu:365: saṃtoṣaḥ kim aśaktatā kim athavā tasminn asambhāvanā Bhall_36a
GK19bhall_iu:367: saṃyuktaphalito 'si kiṃ phalabharaiḥ pūrṇo 'si kiṃ sannataḥ Bhall_37b
GK19bhall_iu:370: saṃlāpās te sa ca mṛdupadanyāsahṛdyo vilāsaḥ Bhall_20b
GK19bhall_iu:371: saṃvittir asty atha guṇāḥ pratibhānti loke Bhall_50a
GK19bhall_iu:372: saṃśuṣyan pṛṣadaṃśa eṣa kurutāṃ mūkaḥ sthito 'py atra kiṃ Bhall_78c
GK19bhall_iu:373: sādhūtpātaghanauga sādhu sudhiyā dhyeyaṃ dharāyām idaṃ Bhall_41a
GK19bhall_iu:378: supto 'dyāpi na budhyate tad itarāṃs tāvat pratīkṣāmahe Bhall_92c
GK19bhall_iu:380: sevitvā bahubhaṅgabhīṣaṇatanuṃ tvām eva velācala- Bhall_46c
GK19bhall_iu:381: sevyaḥ sadbhir itīdam ākalayatā tālo 'dhvagenāśritaḥ Bhall_38b
GK19bhall_iu:382: soḍho yena kadā cid eva na nije goṣṭhe 'nyaśauṇḍadhvaniḥ Bhall_85b
GK19bhall_iu:383: sotsāhā navatoyabhāraguravo muñcantu nādaṃ ghanāḥ Bhall_97b
GK19bhall_iu:384: so 'pūrvaḥ rasanāviparyayavidhis tat karṇayoś cāpalaṃ Bhall_19a
GK19bhall_iu:385: saubhāgyayogyam iha kasya cid uttamāṅgam Bhall_49d
GK19bhall_iu:386: skandhe yena ciraṃ dhṛto 'si vidadhe yas te saparyām api Bhall_98b
GK19bhall_iu:388: stabdhaḥ khalaḥ phalati varṣaśatena tālaḥ Bhall_34d
GK19bhall_iu:389: sphītas tādṛg aho ghanena ripuṇā dagdho girigrāmakaḥ Bhall_40d
GK19bhall_iu:390: svapakṣād bhetavyaṃ na tu bahu vipakṣāt prabhavataḥ Bhall_90b
GK19bhall_iu:393: svaśaktyā bhānty ete divasakṛti saty eva na punaḥ Bhall_90d
GK19bhall_iu:394: svasthas tān na nipātayed iti yathākāmaṃ na sampoṣitaḥ* Bhall_78b
GK19bhall_iu:396: svātantrye parivṛtya tiṣṭhati karau vyādhūya dhairyaṃ gate Bhall_8b
GK19bhall_iu:397: svāyāsāyaiva sādho tava śalabha javābhyāsadurvāsaneyam Bhall_86b
GK19bhall_iu:399: haṃsasyāsya manāṅ na dhāvati manaḥ śrīdhāmni padme kva cit Bhall_92b
GK19bhall_iu:401: he kālakūṭa tava janma kathaṃ payodhau Bhall_102d
GK19bhall_iu:403: he sadvṛkṣa sahasva samprati sakhe śākhāśikhākarṣaṇa- Bhall_37c
